column5: Looks like a few more cold nights ill be out for Crappies on the ice ...ill keep ya posted to when its safe ....
can't wait,,,really getting the itch for some ice fishing!!
Great news Fishmaster  I too can't wait to get on the ice Tight lines Leechman
i would love to catch some crappies on the ice  keep us posted!
Glad to hear that steve,looks like it wont be long,hope it comes real soon !!!!
The main river was only 32 degrees today. It should skim over the next calm night too.
now you just need to toss a coin and figure out who is putting on the floater suit and going for a walk and who is holding the rope  I know some nice fish where caught by your place last season
As allways JWL im the 1st to brave the Ice Thickness ....

Well here is your Ice Report for Dec 22nd  ;D Marina Ice Thickness 6"to 8" Main River Thickness 3" to 3 1/2 " getting on the ice is not to bad...if you have Cleats for your boots bring them ... If you don't own a Floater Suite Stay Away from Main River ...for atleast 1 more cold night .... ...As Allways Bring a Friend if your heading out on the River a good spud is also good to have ..Be Safe see ya soon Fishmaster

Well after plowing snow most of the day thought  i better hit the ice for a half hour ...all i can say is that wind was BURRRRRR even Zoe wanted to go home ..marked a few fish had a couple follow ups but no takers tonight back at it tommrow ...ice was 4 1/2 " were i fished in 15 fow tonight ...be safe ...
glad to hear the ice is comming along so nicely!    A few of us are definately making the trip down this weekend!  Can't Wait!!!
Oh yeah buddy.  Im pumped!!  Cant wait!   Jim
+5 degree's and RAIN Tomorrow...That's not gonna help the cause so much - followed with overnight wind gusts up to 64kph - poor santa's gonna have a rough flight!
Oh No...these temps & rain are gonna give a royal kicken to any plans of goin out on that ice this weekend!  Hopefully it'll change
Marina Ice is now Safe again to fish Crappies ...Main River still Open Water won't be long now though ...
Thanks for keeping us posted....I have yet to ice my first 'eye, so, I could be showing up on your doorstep as soon as the ice is good    I'm looking for anywhere I can go to break this curse!
